Name: Artillery, Mid
Description: Buy HE grenades and chuck all of them at the first player your team sees.

Name: Patience is a Virtue
Description: You are not allowed to enter either site until the final 30 seconds of the round.

Name: CQB Masters
Description: Everyone must use a shotgun. If you can't equip the whole team, you are not allowed to attack enemies until you pick one up.

Name: Lure Them In
Description: Abandon both sites until the bomb is planted.

Name: Quiet on Comms
Description: Everyone must make intentionally vague or false callouts throughout the round.

Name: Stop Camping!
Description: Everyone pick a corner or angle to sit in. Once you get there, you cannot move until the bomb is planted.

Name: Use My Weapon, I Beg You!
Description: You must buy a gun for the person below you on the leaderboard (bottom buys for top). They must use only that weapon and grenades for the entire round.

Name: Commentary
Description: The player on the bottom of the leaderboard must give CS Major style commentary of every action the team is taking for the whole round.

Name: Early Rotation
Description: Everyone rushes one of the sites. Once your team gets a kill, stop all engagements and quickly rotate to the other site.

Name: Mid Rush
Description: Everyone rushes mid. No stopping until you reach the enemy or their spawn.

Name: Don't Be a Loser
Description: You are not allowed to defuse with a kit, but the bomb MUST be planted and defused.

Name: Russian Bias
Description: You are only allowed to use Russian-made weapons (AK-47, PP Bizon, and knife).

Name: No Wasted Ammo
Description: Manual reloading is forbidden, you can only reload by emptying the magazine.

Name: Alcoholics United
Description: Everyone must buy a molotov. Pick a site to rush, then throw all molotovs onto the site before entering.

Name: Designated Smoking Area
Description: Everyone must buy a smoke. Pick a site to rush, then throw all smokes onto the site before entering.

Name: Defeatists
Description: Everyone must communicate as if the round is hopeless and criticize every teammate's performance for the entire round.

Name: Waste of Money
Description: Any gun with a skin you bought off the Steam market cannot be used this round. Knives and grenades are allowed.

Name: Pay to Win
Description: Only guns with a skin you bought off the Steam market can be used this round. Knives and grenades are allowed.

Name: Decoy Out!
Description: Buy a decoy grenade and throw it at the first enemy you see before shooting them.

Name: Carpet Bombing
Description: Everyone must buy four grenades of any type. Push one of the sites, then throw every grenade on the site before or during the push.

Name: Greeting Party
Description: Stack everyone on one site, and have everyone sit just around the corner at a single enterence.

Name: MVM Rush
Description: The bomb carrier must equip the bomb and continue running towards the nearest site until they plant. If they die, the next man must take his place.

Name: Quad Fake
Description: Four players must rush one site, while the fifth lurks by the opposite site waiting to plant.

Name: Terrorist Supremacy
Description: You may only use guns that are only available to T-side.

Name: Counter-Terrorist Supremacy
Description: You may only use guns that are only available to CT-side.

Name: James Bond
Description: You may only use a pistol of any kind, no grenades or armor may be used.

Name: Trash Talk
Description: Every 30 seconds or so (and after any player dies) type some form of trash talk or ragebait in chat.

Name: Literally Throwing
Description: The bottom player on the team must try as hard as possible to lose the round without damaging any teammates directly.

Name: Sacrificial Lamb
Description: Send the bottom player to hold a bombsite on his own, while everyone else must avoid that side of the map unless the player dies.

Name: Tower of Babble
Description: For players who know a second language, use it to make frequent callouts. For anyone else, try an accent.

Name: Ramirez!
Description: All callouts must be preceeded by saying "Ramirez!"

Name: Smoke Detector
Description: Any dead players must frequently make a "beep!" noise as if they had an out of battery smoke detector (bonus points if you actually do have one).

Name: Save the Eardrums
Description: Buy and use only suppressed weapons.

Name: Hemorrhoids
Description: Everyone must stand IRL for the entire round.

Name: Flame Walker
Description: Everyone must buy a molotov, and take at least one tick of damage from it during the round.

Name: You Don't Know Your Lineups Bro
Description: Open a Youtube video on grenade lineups for that map. Listen to it for the duration of the round.

Name: Shoigu! Gerasimov!
Description: All players must waste two full magazines of ammo before they attack an enemy.

Name: Pew Pew
Description: Players must imitate the sounds of their weapons while firing.

Name: Youtube While Eating
Description: If you have a second monitor, play on it. If you don't, pull up a youtube review of a monitor on max volume during the round.

Name: Stop Yapping, You're Dead
Description: Only living players can speak.

Name: You're Dead, Start Yapping
Description: Only dead players can speak.

Name: Great Googly Moogly
Description: You are not allowed to aim at angles or enterences until the enemy pushes you. You can only aim at random walls or other areas the enemy could not appear at.

Name: Sector Clear
Description: The first person to check any given corner must announce "All clear" or a variation of this, regardless of truth.

Name: I Thought it Was A
Description: If the bomb is planted, you must first clear the opposite site to be sure nobody is there before you can attack the actual site.

Name: Geopolitical "Discussion"
Description: All players must stay where they are and do nothing until the match time reaches 30 seconds or the bomb is planted. Use this time to discuss the state of the world.

Name: Scapegoat
Description: If your team loses this round, the bottom frag must explain why they caused the loss in all chat. If you win, they can explain how they carried. Both have a 15 word minimum.

Name: Who's There?
Description: When the bomb is planted you must go check your door to see if you heard a knock like the schizo you are.

Name: Never Forget
Description: Your team must attack the same site in two seperate waves.

Name: Police Brutality
Description: Only buy tasers and flashes.

Name: Helen Keller
Description: Turn game volume off. All kills must be gotten while flashed.

Name: Lone Wanderer
Description: Send one player out from spawn at a time, while everyone else must remain still. When the player dies, another must take his place.

Name: One Armed Bandit
Description: Only use one hand to move, aim, etc. The hand must remain the same for the entire round.

Name: Throw it in Reverse
Description: You are only allowed to move backwards, not forwards or sideways.

Name: Green Beret
Description: You can only use weapons that have been picked up from an enemy during the round. Grenades and knives are allowed.

Name: Superior Lefties
Description: You must swap hands on the keyboard and mouse (generally, this means left hand on mouse, right hand on keyboard).

Name: Simple
Description: Buy as many snipers as you can afford and use all of them (up to 5). Only no-scoping is allowed.

Name: I'm Invincible!
Description: If you take damage, you must go back to your spawn (to heal, of course).

Name: Frozen
Description: Do not move from your spawn position for the first minute of the round.

Name: Red Light, Green Light
Description: For the first 30 seconds of the round, you can move, but for the next 30, you must stand still. This repeats until the game ends.

Name: Bunny Hop
Description: You must continuously jump until the round ends.

Name: Wall Hugging
Description: Run to the nearest wall. You must remain in contact with a wall (or adjacent object) for the rest of the round.

Name: Marathon
Description: At least one player on your team must make a full rotation around the map (longest route possible) before you are allowed to plant.

Name: Stacking +2s
Description: Every kill must be done while standing on another player.

Name: Wait Your Turn
Description: Only one player is allowed to move at a time.

Name: Left and Right Brain
Description: For the first 30 seconds of the round, you may only touch your keyboard. For the next 30 seconds, you may only touch your mouse. This repeats until the round ends.

Name: Anti-Humiliation
Description: You cannot attack enemy players until one of your teammates dies to a knife, grenade, or Zeus.

Name: Diversity
Description: Every enemy must take damage from at least two different weapons before dying (e.g. M4A4 and MP9)

Name: Based Loaded
Description: At some point in the round, you must have a player standing on each site and in the enemy spawn. You cannot attack enemies until you achieve this.

Name: One Way Out!
Description: Each player on the team must make it to the enemy spawn before the end of the round. If anyone dies, you can no longer attack the enemy or defuse the bomb.

Name: Wordle
Description: Complete the Wordle before you leave spawn. If it is already completed, wait 30 seconds. If there are only 45 seconds left in the round, you can start moving.

Name: The Blind Leading the Blind
Description: A player must kill themselves on spawn (Molly, falling, Teamkill). All other players must close their eyes and be guided by the spectating player for the rest of the round.

Name: Minute to Win It
Description: You have exactly one minute to play the round. After that time, you must take your hands off the mouse and keyboard.

Name: Reported to HR
Description: If you kill a player you must tea bag them 3 times before you can fire your gun again.

Name: Free For All
Description: When an enemy or a teammate dies and drops a gun, everyone on the team has to run towards it and try to pick it up. You can not shoot while running to the gun.

Name: Ready or Not
Description: When you see an enemy, you must stop moving and tell them in chat to get on the ground before attacking them.

Name: Weapons Master
Description: Every kill must be done with a different weapon.

Name: Assisted Dying
Description: Every kill must come with an assist unless there is only one player left on your team.

Name: Build the Wall
Description: Stack a site of your choice and build a five player wall. Once someone dies or the bomb is planted the wall can be dissolved.

Name: Legally Blind
Description: The current top scorer on your team must turn off their monitor (or look away from their screen) for the entire round.

Name: AFK?
Description: Everyone stays in spawn until the bomb is planted or the enemy team peaks spawn.

Name: Silent Killer
Description: You can only walk or crouch walk to move, no running is allowed.

Name: Attack the D Point!
Description: Take one site, then immediately rush to the other site and plant.

Name: LMG Rush
Description: Everyone must use any LMG, and those who cannot afford it must use only a knife and grenades.

Name: COD Player
Description: You must jump and prefire every corner.

Name: Airborne
Description: Every kill must be done while jumping.

Name: XCOM
Description: The person on the bottom of the leaderboard must tell each person in the squad what area of the map to go to. Nobody can move anywhere else without the Commander's EXPLICIT approval.

Name: Equality
Description: You are not allowed to have more players alive than the enemy team until you kill the final player.

Name: Grenade Master
Description: Nobody on the team can use weapons until somebody gets a grenade kill on enemy.

Name: Half Life
Description: You cannot attack the enemy until you have less than 50 HP.

Name: Butter Fingers
Description: You must drop any weapon you get a kill with. Can only use it again after you get a kill with another weapon.

Name: Crab Rave
Description: You are only allowed to move sideways, not forwards or backwards.

Name: At Least Be Original
Description: You are not allowed to use or buy any weapons or grenades you used in the previous round.

Name: Vomit
Description: When somebody gets a kill, that player must drop every weapon and grenade and pick them back up before attacking an enemy again.

Name: Secret Service
Description: If the top scorer on your team dies, you must throw the round.

Name: Better Call SAW
Description: Every kill must be done with an M249 or a knife.

Name: Human Shield
Description: All bullets must be fired from behind a teammate (bullets must pass no more than a meter from their body).

Name: Tiki Taka
Description: The bomb must be passed to another player within 5 seconds of picking it up. This lasts until the bomb is planted.

Name: The Radical Left
Description: You are only allowed to turn your view left.

Name: Formation
Description: All players must move or stop in unison. Anyone caught moving or stopping seperately should probably be executed.

Name: They'll Never See it Coming
Description: When entering any room or peeking any corner, you must throw your pistol around the corner first as if it were a flashbang.

Name: Everyone Gets a Turn
Description: Your team must allow the bomb to be planted, then have every remaining team member start a defuse before defusing it.

Name: RAM is Expensive
Description: Change your resolution to the lowest possible setting.

Name: I Only Need One Mag
Description: You are not allowed to reload any weapon during the round.

Name: Hackers, Hackers Everywhere
Description: When the first player on your team dies, everyone else must hide for 30 seconds and relentlessly accuse their killer of cheating.

Name: Encouragement
Description: Everyone follows directly behind the top player, constantly giving them "encouragement". If they die, switch to berating them as you try to win the round.

Name: War Pig
Description: The bomb carrier can only walk and must have the bomb out the entire time.

Name: 4 Verticals QB Sneak
Description: Send 2 players to each bomb site, but the bomb carrier must push through mid.

Name: Tush Push
Description: All players must travel adjacent to one another. The bomb carrier must have the bomb out and be in the middle of the pack.

Name: I Can't See Without My Glasses
Description: You must squint your eyes to the point of blurriness for the entire round.

Name: Tinnitus
Description: Players must remove headphones or disable audio for the round.

Name: Escalation of Force
Description: All players can only use a Zeus until at least one teammate kills an enemy with one.

Name: "Pros Don't Stick"
Description: You must defuse the bomb while at least one enemy is still alive. The bomb must be planted.

Name: Cuck Chair
Description: Every kill must be spectated by a dead teammate.

Name: I'm Gonna Burst
Description: Players can only use weapons set to burst fire mode.

Name: Cover is For Suckers
Description: You are not allowed to use cover.

Name: Memory? What Memory?
Description: Open another game and have it open for the duration of the round.

Name: It Came to Me in a Dream
Description: Bottom player calls the enemy team's play, whole team must work to counter it regardless of whether it is right.

Name: Loot Gremlin
Description: When an enemy drops a weapon, whichever player is closest must immediately rush towards it until they pick it up.

Name: Release the Files
Description: Spend the round trying to convince the enemy team that the "bomb" did not spawn in and that the idea that you would bomb something is just a hoax.

Name: Communism
Description: Your team must buy things until everyone has the same amount of money (if this is not possible, get it as close as you can).

Name: Liberty Prime
Description: After each kill, you must stop and type an extremely patriotic statement in chat (minimum of 5 words) before moving again or attacking another enemy.

Name: Totally Not Scared
Description: The first person to enter each new room or area must be looking backwards.

Name: Power Play
Description: The top player on your team must stay in spawn for the first two minutes of the round.

Name: Rules of Engagement
Description: You cannot attack anyone unless they attack you first.

Name: Stay Onsides
Description: When entering any new room or area, the bomb must enter first (NOT the bomb carrier). If the bomb enters a site and then leaves, everyone else must leave the site before they can attack it again.

Name: President's Curse
Description: The top player on the team must try as hard as possible to lose the round without damaging any teammates directly.

Name: Terrorist Roleplay
Description: For the entire round, you must do your best impersonation of a real life terrorist.

Name: Wealth Tax
Description: The player with the most money is the only one allowed to buy this round. In the event of a tie, highest score wins.

Name: CS GPT
Description: Ask an AI of your choice what the strategy for this terrorist round should be. You must follow it.

Name: To Goâ€¦Even Further Beyond!
Description: You can only move or attack enemies while yelling.

Name: Victory Requires Sacrifice
Description: Each player must buy the most expensive weapon they can and throw it out of the map. If your team wins the round, play the next round without a strat.

Name: On Overwatch
Description: After planting the bomb, everyone must leave the site and cannot return.

Name: Evidence Locker
Description: When you kill a terrorist, you must take one of their weapons back to your spawn before you can attack another enemy.

Name: Breadth-First Search
Description: Everyone must push the same site, but must also take different paths to get there (some of the path can be the same, such as direction out of spawn).

Name: London
Description: Your team must get at least one knife kill during the round.

Name: Line of Sight
Description: Every player on your team must be visible by every other player on your team at all times.

Name: Broken Bomb Sight
Description: Everyone on your team must buy full grenades. Before entering a site, throw every grenade out of the map.

Name: Valorant
Description: Every time top-frag gets a kill all teammates must give them an uwu in voice chat.

Name: Skiing
Description: Players must move in 45 degree angles (for example, holding W and A at the same time).

Name: Slithering Snake
Description: All players must stay crouched and move in a single file line until the bomb is planted.

Name: Apes Together Poor
Description: Everyone must buy the most expensive gun that the poorest person on the team can afford.

Name: Paper Shredder
Description: Every kill must be a wallbang.
